thread.title: BRIEF-Corteva Agriscience Announces New U.S. Multi-Channel, Multi-Brand Seed Strategy

title: BRIEF-Corteva Agriscience Announces New U.S. Multi-Channel, Multi-Brand Seed Strategy
text:
May 9, 2018 / 4:12 PM / in 9 minutes BRIEF-Corteva Agriscience Announces New U.S. Multi-Channel, Multi-Brand Seed Strategy Reuters Staff
May 9 (Reuters) - Corteva Agriscience:
* CORTEVA AGRISCIENCE, AGRICULTURE DIVISION OF DOWDUPONT, ANNOUNCES NEW U.S. MULTI-CHANNEL, MULTI-BRAND SEED STRATEGY
* SAYS WILL GO TO MARKET THROUGH FIVE REGIONAL CORN AND SOYBEAN SEED BRANDS IN U.S. * SAYS CURRENT U.S. AGREEMENTS WILL REMAIN IN PLACE
* SAYS DUPONT PIONEER AND DOW AGROSCIENCES WILL HONOR PROGRAM, PRODUCT AND SERVICE OBLIGATIONS FOR EXISTING SEED ORDERS
* SAYS PIONEER WILL REMAIN COMPANYâ€™S GLOBAL FLAGSHIP SEED BRAND Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
